name: Ten Floors To The Roof
description:
Ten Floor To The Roof is a 2D walking simulator with puzzle elements.
You were returning from a party and decided to get some fresh air on the roof, but in some mystical way you were trapped.Endless floors await you. Carefully observe your surroundings to get to the Roof, because you only need to walk ten floors to get to the goal.
In this game, you will need to figure out whether you are in the right room or trapped in a mystical loop.Remember what the original floor looks like to get to the roof.After all, your mistake can bring you back to the first floor.

Key features :
1) Simple and intuitive gameplay that can tickle your nerves
2) Nice graphics
3) Suspenseful soundtrack
